name: Action
description: Fast-paced films with exciting sequences, stunts, and physical challenges

name: Drama
description: Serious, plot-driven films that focus on character development and emotional themes

name: Comedy
description: Humorous films designed to make audiences laugh through witty dialogue and situations

name: Science Fiction
description: Films featuring futuristic technology, space exploration, and speculative concepts

name: Horror
description: Films designed to frighten and unsettle audiences through suspense and supernatural elements

name: Romance
description: Films that focus on love stories and romantic relationships between characters

name: Thriller
description: Suspenseful films that create tension and excitement through plot twists and danger

name: Fantasy
description: Films featuring magical worlds, supernatural creatures, and imaginative settings

name: Documentary
description: Non-fiction films that document real events, people, or subjects

name: Animation
description: Films created using animated techniques, including traditional, computer, and stop-motion
